person.persName: John S. McDonald (New Albany, Indiana, banker)

body.p: New Albany, Indiana, banker. Pennsylvania native. Married to Nancy McDonald. Father of Nathaniel McDonald, Morris McDonald, Sarah H. McDonald, Alice McDonald, Sophia McDonald, John S. McDonald, Jr., and Carrie A. McDonald. President of the Bank of the State of Indiana branch in New Albany from 1860 to 1864. Member of the Lincoln Campaign Club in New Albany in 1860.
